Text.val: Author: Stephan Huppertz
25.04.2013 JH SCR18105 Removed external flag
08.11.2010 SH SCR15370 Extended test to skip empty rows from file also in case
of Hex 00 (so all rows with lenght <= 1)
02.11.2010 SH SCR15370 Added test to skip empty rows from file
29.07.2010 SH SCR15201 Added GB007.PI.LANGUAGE = CLNT201_LANGUAGE
-- Call BSP106 to handle the old 'DD' debtor file in case of no errors are found
-- Prepare a new 'DD' file without lines where errors are found, BSP106
has to handle them directly, lines with errors have to be checked via OMQ188
@ Program uses the same input layout as defined in BSP106
-- Init following check variables to test if there is a change with values which
never exists
(if using default values then the program never detects empty / 0 fields)
-- If at least one NFER (error) row is stored set PO.ERROR = TRUE
-- Define the handling type if no errors are detected
(not if uploaded via website --> PI.NFIR_IFIL_ID = 0)
-- Set error flag to enable storing of MQ188 in BSP200 if client is not allowed
to send debtor files (PO.RUNTYPE has to be defined for these clients)
@Program does not support any header lines
... ignore blank rows
... always update NFIR_ADMNO / NFIR_CLNTNO for first row where adminstration and
client exist
-- Only the client number is extracted from the file, all other fields are not
used in BSP201_82
-- Check for existing client (only once or in case of changes)
-- Error --> Client does not exisrts
-- Stop further testing, client is not allowed to send debtor files
... fetch error text
-- Prepare DD file without error rows
-- Check if an error exists for the current selected row from ASCII file
.. update v.Counter (function Counter(0) does not work in LinkQuery -> NFER)
... read row from original file
... write row to new file if there was no error found
